publication-highlights.name: Civil Engineering Magazine
publication-highlights.caption: The official magazine of the American Society of Civil Engineers.
publication-highlights.body:
Featured this Month

Topographic Transformation

June 2017

The formerly flat Governors Island, in New York City harbor, is home to four artificial hills that provide spectacular views of the surrounding scenery. Rising as much as 70 ft above the island surface, the hills were very carefully designed and engineered to remain stable even where they are the steepest.

Continue →

member-stories.name: Nakeia Jackson, S.M.ASCE
member-stories.quote: I get to change the world with my work … this motivates me and excites me for the future of being an engineer.

member-stories.name: Natalie Mills, EI, A.M.ASCE
member-stories.quote: [ASCE is] where I met some of my closest friends. It’s more than a group I’m involved in; it’s really become a family.

member-stories.name: Chuck Pennoni, P.E., L.S., Pres.92.ASCE
member-stories.quote: In the more than 50 years since I became a licensed professional engineer, ASCE has been my first and foremost resource for not only technical and professional development, but also broadening my skills in the business world.
